name: Klappy Bird Runner
description:
Klap klap KLAP! as Klappy Bird's feet hit the ground, run as far as you can!

How many pipes can you clear?

Tap the screen to propel a tiny, pixelated bird upwards. If you miss any of the green pipes on your way as you run towards some unknowable, unreachable finish line, the game is over. The goal is to simply accumulate the highest possible score.
